speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, this morning the Senate will be in a period of morning business for 1 hour, with the time divided equally between the majority and the minority. The minority will control the first half of the time and the majority will control the second half.

Following morning business, the Senate will proceed to the consideration of H.R. 976, and I expect the majority manager, Senator Baucus, to call up his amendment at the desk, which will be the text of the SCHIP legislation reported overwhelmingly by the Senate Finance Committee last week.
Today the Senate will recess at 12:30 for its respective policy work periods.
